article.title: 2008 Export Achievement Award Winners - Pittsburgh U.S. Export Assistance Center
article.summary: Learn more about the 2008 winners of the Export Achievement Award from the Pittsburgh area.
article.content:
â€‹

Acting Secretary of the U.S. Commercial Service and Director of General Trade Promotion Israel Hernandez with Congressman Phil English (PA-03) presenting the Export Achievement Award to Dura-Tite CEO James Karnes

  • Dura-Tite Systems, LLCdeveloped and introduced a revolutionary plastic fitting to the Heating, Ventilation and Air Conditioning industry in 2006. Through a combination of consulting and market research, the U.S. Commercial Service in conjunction with the other export assistance organizations, DuraTite Systems make their first export sale to Mexico and helped open up the Middle East Market in 2007. Dura-Tite was awarded The Export Achievement Award by Congressman Phil English (PA-03) at the U.S. Commercial Services and Gannon University SBDC Luncheon on August 12, 2008, following CongressmanEnglish's annual Business Development Conference and Expo.The award was accepted by DuraTite's CEO, James Karnes and Director of Marketing & Sales, Stacy Corapi.
